name: Cat on a Diet
description: Swipe and prod to claw away at wooden blocks, unscrew bolts, control powerful magnets and explode highly volatile uranium – anything to reach those cookies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz Graphics: nVidia 320M or higher, or Radeon 7000 or higher, or Intel HD 3000

reviews.review_text: And put a knife to your throat  if you are given to gluttony (or cookies).  Proverbs 23:2  Cat on a diet teaches a lesson about gluttony and laziness. The cat doesn't even move, you have to cut wooden blocks to make him fall into the cookie jar, so he can eat his stupid cookies. To prove he's so lazy, if you watch the cookie jar in world 1, there are less cookies in each level. This game is good if you just want to get something for 5 bucks.
Bought this game for the wife to play, she tried it out and was immediately addicted to it and is going to play it more later and likes it so far

You play as an invisible force whose task is to help a cat who is too fat to be able to move to get into the cookie jar on each level, and optionally catch muffins along the way, by breaking wooden boards, using magnets to yank around metal objects, making him travel through baskets etc. Simple enough, easy to get into.  Despite the fact that its core mechanics are not that sophisticated and there are similar free flash games on the Internet, I would still recommend you to pick it up if you like puzzle games involving terrain manipulation. The cat is cute, the graphics are quite nice for a game like this, and while completing the levels isn't usually hard (with a few exceptions), the two additional challenges you get on each level (complete the level with a given amount of clicks, and get all the floating muffins around the map) are hard enough to entertain you for a while.  If nothing else, get it on sale - it is almost free that way.

But now she cannot even play OFFLINE ANYMORE!!!!! I want a refund!!!! You got some nerve putting Online DRM into this cheap rubbish game! Its so dissapointing! Either you fix it! Or refund my hard earned money!

It's an excellent physics/puzzle game. Not too hard nor too easy. And it's funny to unlock all costumes for this big cat (even if nobody knows how too unlock the last one, so it's impossible to get 100% achievement...)
